feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: WNW 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:54 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
